page.title: 19Organisations in Codsall
page.content: Codsall and District Disabled Club was formed almost 20 years ago to benefit the handicapped living in the area.Club meetings are held once a month and in the summer we have an outing to a place of interest. Some of the members are severely disabled and cannot manage without wheelchairs. We are a happy Club with, we hope, a good committee who devote a lot of their time for the Members' benefit. South Staffordshire Local Village Transport is a registered charity, formed to provide transport for those elderly, disabled or infirm residents of Codsall and surrounding villages who are unable to use normal public transport, to enable them to attend Day Care Centres and Clubs and enjoy leisure and shopping outings. We own a 12 seater mini-bus, provided by "Help The Aged" in 1983.
